reviews.review: Portal 2 is a well-constructed masterpiece that is loved by all. The game itself belongs in the Louvre, in Paris, France. I definitely recommend this game to anyone who loves puzzle platformers, dark humor, rich stories, comedy, adventure, and first-person experiences.

Portal 2 is a first-person science fiction puzzle-platform game and the sequel to the series taking place in Aperture Science’s Enrichment Center consisting of numerous test chambers.

The game features both single-player and cooperative game modes. Single-player mode provides an immersive story while the cooperative game mode is a new way to play the game. Being able to cooperate with a friend to solve puzzles and achieve common goals is a great experience.

The storytelling is very impressive. The unusual humor the game has makes it very special. The game is much longer than the first game, even without including the cooperative courses.

The game includes more diverse mechanics compared to the first game. The mechanics are so much fun and creative. There is even an incredibly useful upgrade to the hand-held portal device.

Understandably, playing games with outdated graphics might not be easy for some players. Outdated graphics in puzzle games may cause headaches and nausea. Unlike the first game, the graphics are not out of date. The game still stands strong in terms of visuals after many years.

With its originality, Portal 2 is a must-play puzzle game and a perfect example of a successful sequel making the first game feel more like a tutorial. It is also a great privilege to meet Cave Johnson. Please keep in mind that there are no cakes in this game, only lemons and a potato.
How are you holding up? Because I'm a potato.

Рекомендую ли я эту игру? Одназначно да, да и да. Великопленое продолжение первого портала, который был, так скажем для valve как эксперимент? Продолжение портала может похвасться в отличии от первой части раскрытием сюжета, большим количеством локаций, улучшенной графикой, великолепнымы саундтреки, новыми функциями в игре и новыми персонажами. 
Самое лучшее, что дали valve, так это сама Глэдос, которую я очень полюбила после прохождения и её песня "want you gone" в титрах, и САМОЕ ВАЖНОЕ - это постройка СОБСТВЕННОЙ тестовой камеры и возможности разместить его в мастерской. 
Даже на данный момент игра выглядит очень суперски и до сих пор является 11/10!

ce jeu est génial !!!
PS : Je ne suis pas objecif ^^

Hayatımda gördüğüm en mükemmel hikayeye sahip olan oyun bu. Portal 1 de çok iyiydi ama bu oyun çok daha mükemmel. Arada bir çok az fiyata düştüğü oluyor indirimlerde. 1 ve 2 si paket halinde 3 TL miydi neydi. Bir de online modu var. Eğer tek oyunculuda portal açmanın verdiği zevke doymazsanız  çağırın bir arkadaşınızı oynayın . Hem her şeyi takım çalışması içinde yaptığınız için verdiği zevk katlanarak artıyor. Bulmacalar da beyin yakacak türden. Yani kısaca bu oyunu oynamadan ölmeyin.

Super fun, génial en solo, génial en multi. Des énigmes pas toujours simple mais toujours bien trouvées.
Le meilleur investissement possible en terme de plaisir de jeu :)
Стильна головоломка з харизматичними персонажами + можливість зіграти в окрему кооперативну кампанію.

I think that portal 2 is  a fine game but it's a worse sequel since in a lot of moments of the game the gameplay is put to a halt by the story whereas in in the first game it was integrated inside of it. I would say that you should buy it if you played portal (1).

La saga portal me ha llegado al corazón. Me he emocionado con su historia, con las IAs, con los grafitis “del loco” contándome su propia historia. Son unos juegos que me han durado nada, los rompecabezas a los que me iba enfrentando me han parecido brillantes y desafiantes. Y la BSO que me ha ido acompañando durante los dos juegos, de las mejores que he tenido el placer de escuchar, sobretodo en los créditos, que son como en las buenas pelis de Marvel.
Ha sido una experiencia maravillosa haberlos jugado, y los rejugaré varias veces, porque segura estoy que me he dejado cosas en el interior de Aperture. Tengo la certeza que sus personajes tienen mucho que contarme aún.
Reseña completa en [url=https://lamazmorritacasioscura.wordpress.com/2020/08/05/jugando-a-portal-1-y-2/] [b] Jugando a: Portal 1y 2[/b][/url]

The ending was insane, and if you wait a bit for the dialouge to finish at that part ( you will know it when you reach it) it will be even better. This is by far the best end thing the game makes you do in all games i've ever played or seen. Personally i prefer the Portal series over the half life series but this is just my opinion.

If you haven't played the Portal Games, i would suggest you rectify that mistake ASAP.

Didn't much care for the later levels... felt less like a puzzle and more of scavenger hunt to find any white wall. The earlier levels are amazing, the addition of the goop adds a new level to the puzzles, and the banter between GLaDOS, Wheatley, and Cave Johnson was some of the funniest game dialogue I've heard in a while.
Good test subjects follow testing protocols, in the name of science of course

Portal 2 is truly a timeless masterpiece. In my opinion the best out of the 2, rather than the first Portal this game is more narrative and story driven and thats something i really enjoy about this game, with the first portal i found myself getting bored throughout missions. Not once did i feel that with this game. The story (without giving spoilers) is very simple and easy to wrap your head around. It doesn't need to be long and thoughtful. It appeals to almost every demographic i can think of. Everybody who plays this game even if you dont like it can find something to enjoy about it. I feel bad for the people who haven't played this game cause they are missing out on a masterpiece. 10/10

Gran juego de acertijos, los personajes están llenos de vida y carisma, sin duda un titulo excepcional y el apartado cooperativo es bastante entretenido, es un título a temporal que se ha conservado muy bien a lo largo del tiempo tanto en el apartado gráfico y estético, junto a unas excelentes mecánicas.

Its an amazing game, good story line, fun characters, everything was perfect. hardness of the levels was sometimes really a struggle but it was fun, definitely recommend this game.

Portal 2 has got to be one of the greatest puzzle solving games that I have ever played. This amazing squeal allows people to play single player and coop story mode, both with unique story lines, as well as playing solo and coop custom test chambers created by people from around the world. 10/10, hands down.
One of the best video games every. Simple mechanics and complex puzzles with amazing story. Must play.

2: cooperrative with random players

Revisiting a classic. Looks great, feels great to play. Best voice acting of all time. Puzzles that are neither intractable nor too easy, providing just the right amount of payoff. Must have.

Kesinlikle tavsiye ediyorum. Eğer pahalı derseniz Steam birçok haftasonu indirimi, yaz indirimi, kış indirimi, yılbaşı indirimi vb. yapıyor. Kesinlikle alıp oynayın derim. Ama hikayeyi anlamak için ilk oyunu da oynamanız gerekebilir.
